column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////- Best steak I've ever had
column2: hands-down! I had the pepper crusted
column3: prime bone in dry aged ribeye. My gawd.... can you say #foodporn - Fantastic sear
column4: pepper crust that sealed in the flavor. Cooked a perfect medium and filled with juicy flavor. If Starburst made a steak flavor
